text: Dimaadua ne hagababa ang gi dogu damana go David boloo, ‘Dau dama daane dela e hai ko Au gii hai di king i oo muli, gaa hau di Hale Daumaha mai gi di Au.’ Dolomeenei, gei au gu hagamaanadu bolo e haga duu di Hale Daumaha e hagalaamua ai di ingoo Dimaadua go dogu God.5.5 2 Samuel 7.12-13; 1 Kronikel 17.11-12
